amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the Export-Import Bank from providing assistance for transactions within a country ruled by a government which is not chosen through free and fair elections, as certified by the President of the United States, or which lacks an independent judiciary.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the Export-Import Bank from extending credit or any other financial assistance in connection with an enterprise involved in the import or export of goods or services with a company owned by a government thaty is not chosen by free elections or which lacks an independent judiciary.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rohrabacher amendment (A005) Failed by voice vote.
